values: 糖；食糖；糖份；糖果；一茶匙糖（量）；一块方糖；宝贝；亲爱的（爱称）；糖衣（比喻美化或掩饰某物的外表）
加糖；甜化；给…裹上糖衣；使变得讨人喜欢；使宜人；使受欢迎

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 含糖的；甜的；糖状的；甜言蜜语的
无糖的；不含糖的（尤指用糖精配制的）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指用甘蔗或甜菜制成的糖。

bilingual.source: Is there any sugar in my tea?
She does not put sugar in tea.
Too much sugar is bad for you.
There is no sugar in my coffee.
The sugar in soft drinks forms acid.
bilingual.target: 软饮料中的糖会形成酸。

bilingual.source: Too much sugar is bad for our teeth.
bilingual.target: 太多糖对我们的牙齿不好。

list.abstract: 《sugar》是一首英语流行歌曲，由Maroon 5演唱，Mike Posner、Adam Levine、Joshua Coleman等作词、作曲，收录在专辑《V》中。该歌曲是2015年维多利亚的秘密泳装秀秀场音乐。 MV中上演了“闯婚”戏码，骚当表示这是《婚礼傲客》导演大卫·道金的创意，这支MV整整准备了6周才完成。《sugar》在2015年获第58届格莱美奖“最佳流行组合”提名。
sugar是一个英语单词，可以用作名词、动词等词性，可以翻译为食糖、宝贝儿，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell them to put the sugar in the teacup.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让它们把糖放进茶杯中。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? You don't wanna spoil your appetite. Hey, Sugar-O's!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不该影响食欲。糖。

yingyinNormal.en: But if you need to borrow a cup of sugar, I'd be happy to oblige.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你想借点糖，我很乐意施舍给你。

yingyinNormal.en: Add a little bit of sugar and this helps with the color of the loaf itself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加入一点糖，这会提升面包的色泽。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, fellas, grab onto a Sugar-O! Save yourselves! Help! Help, I'm drowning!
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，伙计们, 抓住糖，逃命啊，救命啊，.我淹水了。

yingyinNormal.en: While these two just poured sugar into a muffin cup. It isn't fair! What isn't fair?
yingyinNormal.zh: 而他俩只是把糖装进了松饼杯，这不公平。 怎么就不公平了？

yingyinNormal.en: A couple of glugs of vinegar and some of the sugar. As the onions start to brown and caramelize, start the pork.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放入几勺醋，一些糖，当洋葱变成棕色并略焦时，开始处理猪肉。

yingyinNormal.en: We start with butter and sugar and flour, then we add an egg, and most important of all, the chocolate bits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一步要放黄油，糖，还有面粉，然后还有鸡蛋。最后最重要的是把巧克力放进去。

yingyinNormal.en: We start with butter and sugar and flour, then we add an egg, and most important of all, the chocolate bits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一步要放黄油，糖，还有面粉，然后还有鸡蛋。最后最重要的是把巧克力放进去。

yingyinNormal.en: Put that into a bowl of water to dilute, add some light soy sauce, some sugar. And some corn flour to thicken. And give that a good stir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把它放入一碗水中稀释，放些生抽，加点糖，再加些玉米淀粉勾芡，然后搅拌均匀。

yingyinNormal.en: They have chloroplasts that combine carbon dioxide and water with light energy from the sun to create oxygen and sugar, a form of chemical energy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们有叶绿体。叶绿体把二氧化碳和水份与太阳光能量合成氧气与糖份，一种化学能量。

yingyinNormal.en: The American Heart Association recommends consuming no more than 450 calories from sugar-sweetened beverages per week, the amount in about 3 cans of soda.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国心脏协会建议每周从加糖饮料中食用的卡路里不要超过450，这个数字约相当于三罐苏打水。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

yingyinNormal.en: First of all, I'm a rat, which means life is hard. And second, I have a highly developed sense of taste and smell. Flour, eggs, sugar, vanilla bean. Oh! Small twist of lemon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先我是一只老鼠，这意味生活是相当困苦。第二，我的味觉和嗅觉相当发达。面粉、鸡蛋、糖、香草豆、一小块柠檬皮。

yingyinNormal.en: Which leaves 470 beverages which have extremely high unhealthy levels of calories. Consuming large amounts of rapidly digested sugar and high fructose corn syrup causes a spike in blood sugar and insulin, which can lead to inflammation and insulin resistance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 470种饮料，含有极高且不健康的卡路里消化如此大量的可快速消化的糖与高果糖浆会造成血糖在短时间飙升与触发胰岛素的大量释放，进而导致发炎反应与胰岛素抵抗等现象。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, who wants syrup and who wants cinnamon sugar? I want oatmeal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好啦，谁要普通糖浆谁要肉桂糖浆呀？我要燕麦粥。

yingyinNormal.en: You whip them. I'll sweet talk them. Nothing like leather and sugar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鞭子你来抽，蜜糖我来喂，胡萝卜加大棒最有效了。

yingyinNormal.en: 2 teaspoons of cinnamon. While that is gently heating, beat together caster sugar and eggs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加2勺肉桂，这个在加热的时候，放入白砂糖和鸡蛋。

yingyinNormal.en: And then a tablespoon of brown sugar and that will give a beautiful caramel feel to the loaf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后再是一勺红糖，这会让面包有焦糖的感觉。

yingyinNormal.en: A pie. Oh right. All right, it's no fat, it's no sugar, it's no dairy, it's no good. Throw it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是派。零脂肪，无糖，也没有奶，它不好吃，丢了它。

yingyinNormal.en: Is it possible your blood sugar was low? I was rested, alert and completely aware of my surroundings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的血糖有可能偏低吗？我精神饱满，思维敏锐，对周围环境了如指掌。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 糖; 加糖; 裹糖衣

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 多糖的；很甜的；过分甜蜜的；像糖的；有糖衣的；甜得腻人的

word_family.mean: n. 食糖；糖；宝贝；一块糖；一茶匙糖；亲爱的；麻醉药；毒品

sense_info_list.zh: 糖; 加糖; 裹糖衣

examination_example.sentence: But for many of the smaller islands, <highlight>sugar</highlight> is the only export.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是对于许多较小的岛屿来说，糖是唯一的出口产品。

examination_example.sentence: Whether the labels say 'non-GMO (非转基因的)' or 'no <highlight>sugar</highlight>', or 'zero carbohydrates', consumers are increasingly demanding more information about what's in their food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管标签上写的是“非转基因”、“无糖”还是“零碳水化合物”，消费者越来越多地要求获得更多关于食物中含有什么的信息。

examination_example.sentence: They conducted large-scale research on the role of <highlight>sugar</highlight> in people's health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对糖在人们健康中的作用进行了大规模研究。

examination_example.sentence: They placed the <highlight>sugar</highlight> industry in the spotlight with their new findings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的新发现使制糖业成为焦点。

examination_example.sentence: They turned public attention away from the health risks of <highlight>sugar</highlight> to fat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把公众的注意力从糖的健康风险转移到脂肪上。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 糖; 加糖; 裹糖衣

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 多糖的；很甜的；过分甜蜜的；像糖的；有糖衣的；甜得腻人的

word_family.mean: n. 食糖；糖；宝贝；一块糖；一茶匙糖；亲爱的；麻醉药；毒品

sense_info_list.zh: 糖; 加糖; 裹糖衣

examination_example.sentence: Listening to just 30 minutes of soft music every day may help with healthy blood <highlight>sugar</highlight> levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天听30分钟的轻音乐有维持健康血糖水平的作用。

examination_example.sentence: Many of these genes produce proteins that can improve blood <highlight>sugar</highlight> regulation and insulin levels throughout the body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些基因中产生的蛋白质，可以改善整个身体的血糖调节和胰岛素水平。

examination_example.sentence: The men displayed lower blood <highlight>sugar</highlight> levels at the start of their workouts when they had skipped breakfast than when they had eaten.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些人不吃早餐就运动的血糖水平低于吃过早餐再运动的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 多糖的；很甜的；过分甜蜜的；像糖的；有糖衣的；甜得腻人的

word_family.mean: n. 食糖；糖；宝贝；一块糖；一茶匙糖；亲爱的；麻醉药；毒品

examination_example.sentence: Like the saying goes, “A spoonful of <highlight>sugar</highlight> helps the medicine go down.”
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像俗话说的:“一勺糖能使药吃下去。”

examination_example.sentence: After five minutes, they add <highlight>sugar</highlight> and milk.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 五分钟后，他们加入糖和牛奶。

examination_example.sentence: Could you please put some <highlight>sugar</highlight> in my cup?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请在我的杯子里放些糖好吗?
